snippet: Shabazz Napier scored 20 of his 26 points in the second half as Connecticut earned its 20th victory and improved its chances for an N.C.A.A. tournament berth.
abstract: Connecticut defeats West Virginia, 71-67, in overtime in second round of men's Big East basketball tournament; UConn ensures themselves a berth in the NCAA tournament; Georgetown beats Pittsburgh, 64-52; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Shabazz Napier scored 20 of his 26 points in the second half as Connecticut earned its 20th victory and improved its chances for an N.C.A.A. tournament berth.

headline.seo: Big East Tournament: Napier’s 20-Point Half Leads Huskies’ Comeback
headline.main: UConn Gets 20th Win, Which May Be Enough
headline.print_headline: UConn Gets 20th Win, Which May Be Enough
headline.content_kicker: Connecticut 71, West Virginia 67, OT | GeorgeTown 64, Pittsburgh 52
